channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Check Table Values
item.description: Check Table Values Use this page to view the values associated with a selected check table while building a remediation report. To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config)in Navigation pane. Click the Valuesicon for a check table.

item.title: Export Field Mappings
item.description: Export Field Mappings Use this page to Export a Field Mapping. To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Target Source. Click the Export Field Mappings icon in the Page toolbar.

item.title: Field Mapping History
item.description: Field Mapping History Use this page to: View Field Mapping History Restore Current Field Mapping From History To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Mappingsicon for a Target. Select a field and click the Historyicon in the Page toolbar.

item.title: Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves)
item.description: Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves) Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves) V Use this page to Copy a Mapping. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Or Click the Targetsicon and click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Mappingsicon for a Target or Target Source.

item.title: Field Mappings H
item.description: Field Mappings H Field Mappings V Use this page to: Perform Field Mapping Work with Target Sources that have Multi-part Keys Build a Remediation Report NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To view all field mappings for the selected Target in Map: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page.

item.title: Import Field Mappings
item.description: Import Field Mappings Use this page to Import Mappings. To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Vertical Viewicon for the Source. Click the Import Field Mappingsicon in the Page toolbar.

item.title: Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) H
item.description: Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) H Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) V Use this page when Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration >Value Mapping (Config)in the Navigationpane. Click the Sourcesicon for a check table. Click Vertical Viewfor a Source. Click the Source Tablesicon. Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) V Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) H

item.title: Mapping Approval H
item.description: Mapping Approval H Mapping Approval V Use this page to Approve or Reject Mappings. To access this page, click the green Mapping Approvaltab on the Quick Panel. Mapping Approval V Mapping Approval H Use this page to Approve or Reject Mappings. Field Description Wave Name Displays the name of the Wave as created in Console that contains the Process Area and Object where the new or changed field mapping resides.

item.title: Mapping Approvals Download List
item.description: Mapping Approvals Download List Use this page to Download Mappings for Review. To access this page: Click the Mapping Approvalstab on the Quick Panel. Click the Download Listicon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Wave NAME Displays the Wave name of the current context that contains the mapping. Process Area Displays the Process Area name of the current context that contains the mapping.

item.title: Mapping Status
item.description: Mapping Status Use this page to Configure Mapping Status. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Mapping Statusin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Metrics and Reports Landing
item.description: Metrics and Reports Landing Use this page to access metrics and reports pages as described below. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description Dashboards Metrics Charts Click to view line graphs of daily, weekly and monthly mapping progress of completed versus total mappings. Snap Shot Stats Metrics Click to open the Target Dashboard Statspage to view Object and Target percentages and sum counts about the mapping status by day, week and month.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Objects Use this page to view dashboards at the Object level. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the object priority as set in Console. NAME Displays the name of the Object created in Console and associated with the current context.

item.title: Process Area Launch
item.description: Process Area Launch Use this page to access the pages as described below. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane Click Map in the Context bar. Field Description Wave Name Displays the Wave added in Console and selected (along with the Process Area) in the Context Menu before accessing Map. Click the link to access the Waves page in Console to view details about the Wave. Process Area

item.title: Relationship Fields
item.description: Relationship Fields Use this page to Add Relationship Joins to Sources. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target in the Parent pane. Click the Update Row Sources icon for a Target Source in the Child pane. Click the Secondary Source icon for a Target Source (Add Row) in the Parent pane.

item.title: Relationship Joins H
item.description: Relationship Joins H Relationship Joins V Use this page to Add Relationship Joins to Sources. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Mapin the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target in the Parent pane. Click the Update Row Sources icon for a Target Source in the Child pane. Click the Secondary Source icon for a Target Source (Add Row) in the Parent pane.

item.title: Rule Status
item.description: Rule Status Use this page to Configure Rule Status. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Rule Statusin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Source Check Table (Config) H
item.description: Source Check Table (Config) H Source Check Table (Config) V Use this page when Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config)in the Navigationpane. Click the Sourcesicon for a check table. Click the Source Configicon for a Source. Source Check Table (Config) V Source Check Table (Config) H

item.title: Source Value Tracking
item.description: Source Value Tracking Use this page to View the Source Tables and Fields Mapped to a Lookup Table. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Mapin the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config)in the Navigation pane. Click the Sourcesicon for a check table. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Source. Click the Source Tablesicon. Click the Value Trackingicon. Field Description VALUE MAPPING SOURCE ID Displays the name of the Source that contains the field that has been value mapped.

item.title: Target Dashboard Stats H
item.description: Target Dashboard Stats H Target Dashboard Stats V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Mapin the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page Click the Metricsicon on the Metrics and Reports Landingpage. Target Dashboard Stats V Target Dashboard Stats H Use this page to View Metrics. Field Description Name Displays the object name defined in Console.

item.title: Target Field Groups
item.description: Target Field Groups Use this page to view Field Groups registered to the target. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Field Groupsicon for a Target

item.title: Target Metrics Daily H
item.description: Target Metrics Daily H Target Metrics Daily V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metricsicon on the Metrics and Reports Landingpage. Click the Dailyicon in the Page toolbar. Target Metrics Daily V Target Metrics Daily H Use this page to View Metrics. Field

item.title: Target Metrics Weekly H
item.description: Target Metrics Weekly H Target Metrics Weekly V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metricsicon on the Metrics and Reports Landingpage. Click the Weekly icon in the Page toolbar. Target Metrics Weekly V Target Metrics Weekly H Use this page to View Metrics

item.title: Target Rule Copy To
item.description: Target Rule Copy To Use this page to Copy All Target Rules to Another Target. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click Vertical Viewfor a Target Source. Click the Copy Toicon on the Page toolbar.

item.title: Target Source Copy To
item.description: Target Source Copy To Use this page to Copy a Target Source to Another Target. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click Vertical Viewfor a Target Source. Click the Copy Toicon on the Page toolbar.

item.title: Target Source Rule Book
item.description: Target Source Rule Book Use this page to View All Mappings for a Target. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Rule Bookicon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page.

item.title: Target Source Schema H
item.description: Target Source Schema H Target Source Schema V Use this page to Reset Target Source Schema Field Lengths. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Target Source. Click the Schema Columnsicon on the Target Sources page. Target Source Schema V Target Source Schema H

item.title: Target Sources (Add Row)
item.description: Target Sources (Add Row) Use this page while: Add Update Row Sources that are Views Add Update Row Sources that are Tables Adding an External Source To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Update Row Sourcesicon for a Source.

item.title: Target Sources (Update Row) H
item.description: Target Sources (Update Row) H Target Sources (Update Row) V Use this page to: Add Add Row Sources Add Update Row Sources Add an External Source Add Relationship Joins to Sources To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Update Row Sourcesicon for a Source.

item.title: Target Sources H
item.description: Target Sources H Target Sources V Use this page to: Set a Source Database Object Add ZActive Fields Update Client and Language for all Sources To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Target Sources V Target Sources H Use this page to: Add ZActive Update Unmapped Add Row and Update Row Source Fields to NotUsed Add Update Row Sources Update Client and Language for all Sources Add an Assemble Where Clause Field

item.title: Targets H
item.description: Targets H Targets V Use this page to: Sync Map and Target Design Build a Remediation Report To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Targets V Targets H Use this page to: Sync Map and Target Design Build a Remediation Report Field Description Copy To Click to open the Target Source Copy To page to copy mappings from the current Target rule to another Target rule combination.

item.title: Targets Metrics Monthly H
item.description: Targets Metrics Monthly H Target Metrics Monthly V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metricsicon on the Metrics and Reports Landingpage. Click the Monthly icon in the Page toolbar. Target Metrics Monthly V Targets Metrics Monthly H Use this page to View Metrics.

item.title: User Track Changes
item.description: User Track Changes Use this page to Set up Notifications. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > User Track Changesin the Navigationpane. Field Description USER ID Displays the user name requesting to receive information when changes occur to field mappings, value mappings, or table and rule creation. MAPPING CHANGES Displays how the user will receive information about field mapping changes when a field mapping is either created or reset.

item.title: Value Mapping
item.description: Value Mapping Use this page to Perform Value Mapping. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mappingicon on the Process Area Launch page.

item.title: Value Mapping (Config) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Config) H Value Mapping (Config) V Use this page to Build a Remediation Report. To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config) in Navigation pane. Field Description Target Lookup Table (Config) Click to open the Target Lookup Table page to update configuration for a check table as needed.

item.title: Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) H Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) V Use this page to Perform Value Mapping Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mappingicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Valuesicon for a check table. NOTE: Use Excel Integration to download a spreadsheet that users can update with value mapping values.

item.title: Value Mapping (Sources) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Sources) H Value Mapping (Sources) V Use this page to Perform Value Mapping. To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mapping icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Mappings icon for a check table. Click the check table name link in the LOOKUP column on the Field Mappings page next to a mapping with Xref or RuleXref action.

item.title: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Gate Value Mappingicon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) V Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H Use this page to View Metrics.

item.title: Wave Lookup Table Refresh
item.description: Wave Lookup Table Refresh Use this page to Refresh Target and Legacy Values. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Wave Lookup Table Refreshin Navigationpane. Field Description Refresh Target Values Click to refresh values into check tables. Refresh Legacy Values Click to refresh Legacy Source tables and fields marked as active for the Source and the Source field.

item.title: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) V Use this page to View Metrics. To access this page: Click dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click theGate Field Mappingicon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) V Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H
